description: This Java class is a security configuration for a Spring Boot application, defining security filters, CORS policies, password encoding, authentication management, and security filter chains.

classes.name: SecurityConfig
classes.description: Spring Security configuration class that sets up password encoding, authentication management, JWT filter, CORS setup, and security rules for the application.

methods.name: passwordEncoder
methods.description: Defines a bean for password encoding using BCryptPasswordEncoder.

methods.name: authenticationManager
methods.description: Creates and configures an AuthenticationManager with DaoAuthenticationProvider, linking it to user details service and password encoder.

methods.name: filterChain
methods.description: Configures HttpSecurity for stateless JWT-based security, including public endpoints, CORS, CSRF disable, and filter chain setup.

methods.name: corsConfigurationSource
methods.description: Provides a CORS configuration allowing specified origins, methods, headers, and exposed headers.
